resources.string: Are you sure you want to do this?\nThe answer will not be counted!
The number of remaining cheat tokens is %d!
Learn the most useful phrasal verbs

This app is dedicated to one of the most difficult topics in the English language - phrasal verbs. 
We have included common phrasal verbs. You can read and learn them.
 The app has True/False questions. You can answer questions and get feedback if you answered correctly or not. You also have an interesting option to cheat to find the answer. 
After you have studied the verbs you can get a gift. The gift is a funny wish. 
Enjoy :)
We wish you more correct answers next time. Chin up!
We wish you not to suffer from bumps and bruises during the study.
We wish you to get on with all English phrasal verbs.
We wish you to have knowledge that drops in on your head.
We wish you to always use different phrasal verbs.
Well done!!! Your knowledge of English phrasal verbs is very good. You can share your knowledge.
Huzzah!!! Bravo!!! We wish you to always know the meaning of your training
Do not panic! Try again! You will definitely succeed next time!
